short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increases readability of websites by changing to easier-to-read fonts and adding visual enhancements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Urkle adapts content to improve readability. It provides the following functionalies:
1. Convert font type
2. Modify font size
3. Modify line spacing 
4. Modify word spacing
5. Convert speech to text
6. Highlights alternate paragraphs
7. Provides a reading ruler
8. Provides an immersive reader

For further improvements , Urkle is available on github: https://github.com/oladipupo78/Urkle/tree/main/Urkle%20extension
